explains: adj. 精炼的；有教养的，文雅的；精确的，灵活巧妙的
v. 精炼，提纯；改进，改善；使……文雅（refine 的过去式和过去分词）
wordGroup: refined oil 精制油；精炼油
refined product 轻精炼产品；精制石油产品

sentences.en: El Salvador produces 100,000 tons of refined copper annually.
sentences.cn: 萨尔瓦多一年生产10万吨精炼铜。

sentences.en: This technique is becoming more refined and more acceptable all the time.
sentences.cn: 这项技术变得越来越精密和受人欢迎。

sentences.en: Her diet consisted of natural food, uncontaminated by pesticides, salt or refined sugar.
sentences.cn: 她的膳食是由未受农药、盐或精制糖污染过的天然食品构成的。
